home.ourStorySubtitle: The emotional journey behind the name CUGAT
home.story1Desc: The word 'Cugat' means 'a gathering place, a meeting point' in traditional Anatolian culture. Every evening at our grandmother's house, neighbors would gather, drink coffee, and share stories. We wanted to bring that warmth and togetherness to the modern world.
home.story2Desc: We bring the finest coffee beans from all corners of Anatolia. Behind every cup of coffee lies years of experience and an authentic tradition. We offer a taste that will take you back in time and rekindle your memories with the first sip.
home.story3Desc: CUGAT is not just a cafe - it's a place where life's most beautiful moments are shared. Coffee breaks with friends, first meetings, business conversations, a warm cup in moments of solitude... We become part of everyone's story.
home.story4Desc: Today, CUGAT holds a special place in the lives of thousands of people. Amidst the chaos of modern life, we've become a meeting point for warm and intimate moments. We carry the spirit of grandmother's table into the present.
home.storyClosing: As you drink your coffee and share your story, you become part of CUGAT.
